description: In a fractured timeline where ancient magic and futuristic tech collide, warriors known as Timewalkers battle across epochs to restore balance to the multiverse.
scene: A rain-soaked, neon-lit market in Neo-Kairos, where timelines bleed into each other. Shady figures barter with relics from ancient Egypt and future Martian tech.

player_characters.name: Arin Vox
player_characters.description: A cybernetic knight wielding a sword forged in the past but upgraded with AI.

player_characters.name: Nyra Vale
player_characters.description: A rogue chronomancer who can pause or rewind time.

npc.name: Vektor
npc.description: A mysterious merchant with shifting faces who remembers futures that never happened.
